get.description: Get Search query metadata.
List a Search query.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Sort the response items by a property (ascending (default) or descending).

get.description: Create map tile.

parameters.name: buffer
parameters.description: Buffer on each side of the given tile. It must be a multiple of `0.5`. Output **tilesize** will be expanded to `tilesize + 2 * buffer` (e.g 0.5 = 257x257, 1.0 = 258x258).

parameters.name: asset_bidx
parameters.description: Per asset band indexes (coma separated indexes)

parameters.name: rescale
parameters.description: comma (',') delimited Min,Max range. Can set multiple time for multiple bands.

parameters.name: return_mask
parameters.description: Add mask to the output data.

parameters.name: scan_limit
parameters.description: Return as soon as we scan N items (defaults to 10000 in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: items_limit
parameters.description: Return as soon as we have N items per geometry (defaults to 100 in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: time_limit
parameters.description: Return after N seconds to avoid long requests (defaults to 5 in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: exitwhenfull
parameters.description: Return as soon as the geometry is fully covered (defaults to True in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: skipcovered
parameters.description: Skip any items that would show up completely under the previous items (defaults to True in PgSTAC).

post.description: Get Statistics from a geojson feature or featureCollection.

parameters.name: max_size
parameters.description: Maximum image size to read onto.

parameters.name: asset_bidx
parameters.description: Per asset band indexes (coma separated indexes)

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: List of values for which to report counts.

parameters.name: histogram_bins
parameters.description:
Defines the number of equal-width bins in the given range (10, by default).

If bins is a sequence (comma `,` delimited values), it defines a monotonically increasing array of bin edges, including the rightmost edge, allowing for non-uniform bin widths.

link: https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.histogram.html

parameters.name: histogram_range
parameters.description:
Comma `,` delimited range of the bins.

The lower and upper range of the bins. If not provided, range is simply (a.min(), a.max()).

Values outside the range are ignored. The first element of the range must be less than or equal to the second.
range affects the automatic bin computation as well.

link: https://numpy.org/doc/stable/reference/generated/numpy.histogram.html

parameters.name: scan_limit
parameters.description: Return as soon as we scan N items (defaults to 10000 in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: items_limit
parameters.description: Return as soon as we have N items per geometry (defaults to 100 in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: time_limit
parameters.description: Return after N seconds to avoid long requests (defaults to 5 in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: exitwhenfull
parameters.description: Return as soon as the geometry is fully covered (defaults to True in PgSTAC).

parameters.name: skipcovered
parameters.description: Skip any items that would show up completely under the previous items (defaults to True in PgSTAC).

parameters.description: Buffer on each side of the given tile. It must be a multiple of `0.5`. Output **tilesize** will be expanded to `tilesize + 2 * buffer` (e.g 0.5 = 257x257, 1.0 = 258x258).

parameters.name: asset_bidx
parameters.description: Per asset band indexes (coma separated indexes)

parameters.name: rescale
parameters.description: comma (',') delimited Min,Max range. Can set multiple time for multiple bands.

parameters.name: return_mask
parameters.description: Add mask to the output data.
